channel.title: cozmic country – Lost In The Grooves

item.title: Sun City Girls- Jacks Creek
item.dc:creator: Robert Dayton
item.description: So like a month or three back this Vancouver based mag called The Nerve wanted to do a primer on what they call “Cozmic Country” and asked me to recommend some records and artists for it. So I did. I reprint them here one by one, and if savvy enough, day by day: Sun City … Continue reading "Sun City Girls- Jacks Creek"
item.content:encoded:
So like a month or three back this Vancouver based mag called The Nerve wanted to do a primer on what they call “Cozmic Country” and asked me to recommend some records and artists for it. So I did. I reprint them here one by one, and if savvy enough, day by day:

Sun City Girls- Jacks Creek (1994)
Upon release this album was reviled by the more avant hipster snob crowd. As time passes, its

Johnny Cash- Everybody Loves A Nut (1966)
